channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: With the World Cup a year away, the U.S. men's soccer team needs a shot in the arm
item.description: A handful of dreadful losses — plus some drama between the team's biggest star and its new head coach — has the USMNT looking for a badly-needed rebou...

item.title: How Trump's travel ban could disrupt the way knowledge about health is shared
item.description: Global health specialists talk about the consequences of the full or partial ban on travel to the U.S. from 19 countries.

item.title: Leader of top FEMA disaster coordination office resigns, as Trump moves to eliminate agency
item.description: Jeremy Greenberg was in charge of coordinating federal help after hurricanes, wildfires, earthquakes and other emergencies. He has resigned from leadi...

item.title: Kraft Heinz to remove artificial dyes from all products, like Jell-O and Kool-Aid
item.description: By 2027, Kraft Heinz says all artificial food dyes will be replaced with natural colors. The move comes two months after federal officials called on f...

item.title: Trump threatens Iran's supreme leader, escalating his rhetoric about the conflict
item.description: President Trump called Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei an "easy target" but said, "We are not going to take him out (kill!), at least not...

item.title: G7 leaders urge 'de-escalation' but stop short of calling for Israel-Iran ceasefire
item.description: The joint statement was signed by America's President Trump - who then left the summit in Canada early.

item.title: Toy company challenges Trump’s tariffs before the Supreme Court in long shot bid for quick decision
item.description: An Illinois toy company is challenging Donald Trump’s tariffs at the Supreme Court. Learning Resources Inc. filed an appeal asking the Supreme Court t...

item.title: Minnesota shooting suspect had dozens of potential targets, prosecutors say
Colombian senator in 'extremely critical condition' after being shot
item.description: The presidential hopeful was badly injured in a targeted attack on 7 June.

item.title: NYC Comptroller and mayoral candidate Brad Lander arrested
item.description: NYC Comptroller and Democratic mayoral candidate Brad Lander was arrested by ICE agents Tuesday at immigration court in Manhattan.

item.title: Russia's deadliest attack on Kyiv for months flattens part of apartment block
item.description: Ukrainian officials say a drone smashed into the building, leaving a number of people dead and wounded.

item.title: Israeli forces kill 51 Palestinians waiting for flour at Gaza aid site, witnesses and rescuers say
item.description: It is potentially the deadliest of the almost daily shootings that have been taking place recently near aid distribution sites.

item.title: Trump pardons cost victims, taxpayers $1.3 billion, House Democrats' review says
item.description: President Trump's acts of clemency often release criminals with "no further fines, restitution, probation or other conditions."

item.title: Federal Reserve expected to hold interest rates steady
item.description: The Federal Reserve is meeting for the next two days and will announce its latest decision on U.S. interest rates Wednesday. Javier David, the busines...

item.title: 'I want to get home': Thousands of Britons trapped in Israel as conflict with Iran rages
item.description: Since the conflict with Iran broke out, Israel's airspace has been closed and all flights suspended

item.title: Jury asks three questions during Karen Read trial deliberations
item.description: Jury deliberations are still ongoing in in the Karen Read murder trial. CBS News Boston's Penny Kmitt has more.

item.title: Baltimore Pride celebrates 50 years of supporting LGBTQ+ community
item.description: Baltimore Pride started 50 years ago with a rally near the Washington Monument in the Mount Vernon neighborhood.

item.title: How a weekend of chaos unfolded in the Minnesota shootings
